message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of offering $10000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than that. How about $11500?
I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to offer $10500. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about $11000?
I'm getting close, but I still need to save a bit more. I'm willing to offer $10800. Can you meet me at that price?
I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving too much on the table. How about $11200?
